definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
The Canterbury Tales, collection of stories by Geoffrey Chaucer 喬叟|乔叟[Qiao2 sou3]
pinyin: Kan3 te4 bo2 lei2 Gu4 shi4 Ji2

sentences.english: The Canterbury Tales exist(s) in many manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: 《坎特伯雷的故事》有許多手稿。

sentences.english: If England's Kanter uncle thunder cathedral used the massive gems to carry on the decoration.
sentences.chinese: 如英國的坎特伯雷大教堂用了大量寶石進行裝飾。
選自霍桑短篇小說《坎特伯雷朝聖人》。

sentences.english: The Archbishop of Canterbury is called the Primate of All England.
sentences.chinese: 坎特伯雷大主教被稱爲全英總主教。

sentences.english: Canterbury I make a point of visiting the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 每次我在坎特伯雷時，總要去瞻仰一下大教堂。

sentences.english: But Canterbury would always be the city of the archbishop and monks of Christ Church.
sentences.chinese: 然而，坎特伯雷素來是基督教大主教和僧侶的聚集地。

sentences.english: I borrowed a horse and rode to Canterbury to ask Agnes myself.
sentences.chinese: 我借了一匹馬，騎到坎特伯雷當面去問阿格尼斯。

sentences.english: It should be after the Archbishop of Canterbury pronounces them man and wife.
sentences.chinese: 這是在坎特伯雷大主教宣佈他們成爲夫妻之後進行的。
坎特伯雷大主教柏克特T。

sentences.english: You think that I am the Abbot of Canterbury.
sentences.chinese: 你在想我是坎特伯雷市的修道院長。

sentences.english: This is the chamber of the abbot.
sentences.chinese: 你在想我是坎特伯雷市的修道院長。
坎特伯雷大主教柏克特T。

sentences.english: Canterbury university with engineering is well-known.
sentences.chinese: 坎特伯雷大學以工程學聞名。

sentences.english: The band of monks entered (into) Canterbury, bearing before them a silver cross.
sentences.chinese: 那夥修道士進入坎特伯雷，胸前佩戴銀十字架。

sentences.english: I remember the Archbishop of Canterbury preaching a sermon against rock'n'roll.
sentences.chinese: 我記得坎特伯雷大主教在一場佈道會里批評搖滾樂。

sentences.english: Whenever I'm in Canterbury I make a point of visiting the cathedral .
sentences.chinese: 每次我在坎特伯雷時，總要去瞻仰一下大教堂。

pinyin: Xin1 Nan2 Wei1 er3 shi4 zhou1

definition: Adelaide, capital of South Australia/also written 阿德萊德|阿德莱德

pinyin: Xi1 ao4 da4 li4 ya4 zhou1

definition: British Columbia, Pacific province of Canada
pinyin: Bu4 lie4 dian1 Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 sheng3
